Actions.Name: Overpower
Actions.AreaEffect: All foes adjacent to the attack target take 2 damage.

Actions.Name: Crushing Advance
Actions.Description: The [name] and all allies in range 2 may rush 1 space. Then, all foes adjacent to the [name] take 2 damage.

Actions.Name: Call Out
Actions.Description: A foe in range 3 must save or be shoved 2 towards the [name], then gain hatred of the [name]. On a successful save, they are shoved 1 towards the [name].
